items.title: Van Persie voelt steun en begrip als 'de juiste man voor Feyenoord'
items.summary: Robin van Persie voelt steun en begrip bij Feyenoord. De trainer van de Rotterdammers is niet op zoek naar excuses en gelooft nog altijd dat hij de juiste man is op de juiste plek.

items.title: Van Persie heeft respect voor Valente en Smal: 'Hij kon zijn been niet optillen'
items.summary: Feyenoord worstelt dit seizoen niet alleen met tegenvallende resultaten, maar ook met de fitheid van de selectie. Een hoop spelers, zoals Luciano Valente en Gijs Smal, lopen momenteel op hun tandvlees, maar blijven zich desondanks maximaal inzetten voor de Rotterdammers. Daar is hoofdtrainer Robin van Persie diep onder de indruk van.

items.title: Guardiola says ‚Äòno discussions‚Äô about City exit amid Maresca speculation: football ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ All the latest news going into the weekend programme ‚öΩ Premier League: 10 things to look out for | Mail Dom Re the players that have made it to Afcon, this is a handy explainer of the extent to which Premier League teams will be affected. Some of the names not featuring at Afcon are remarkable, and feature some of the most talented footballers from the continent. The main reason for this is that their nation has not qualified (for example, Ghana), but there have also been omissions from squads that have made it (unexpectedly Ivory Coast‚Äôs Simon Adingra, who was voted the best young player at Afcon 2023, providing a fine assist for the winner in the final) and there has even been an unexpected retirement on the eve of the tournament (Nigeria‚Äôs William Troost-Ekong, who was voted the player of the tournament at the last Afcon). Continue reading...

items.title: Tegenvaller voor Haller: spits FC Utrecht mist Afrika Cup
items.summary: S√©bastien Haller komt niet in actie op de Afrika Cup van 2025. De spits van FC Utrecht is door een blessure die hij bij zijn club opliep niet inzetbaar voor Ivoorkust en heeft zich moeten afmelden voor het toernooi.

items.title: Carl Hoefkens: 'Ik heb geen enkele interesse in een andere club dan NAC'
items.summary: Carl Hoefkens (47) heeft een functie als hoofdtrainer van RC Genk afgezegd. Dat vertelde de oefenmeester van NAC Breda vrijdagmiddag in aanloop naar het belangrijke degradatieduel met Telstar. Donderdag kwam de interesse van de topclub naar buiten, maar de Belg committeert zich aan de Bredanaars en focust zich vol op de sportieve wederopstanding.

items.title: Vote to exclude best teams from League Cup shows calendar needs urgent attention | Suzanne Wrack
items.summary: A crowded international calendar is undermining domestic leagues and WSL Football has been left to figure it out When the League Cup quarter-finals are played on Sunday it will probably be the last time they look this way. . West Ham v Manchester City, Liverpool v Chelsea, Manchester United v Tottenham and Crystal Palace v Arsenal means the top four in the Women‚Äôs Super League are involved. With clubs having voted to remove teams competing in the Champions League from next season, major changes are afoot. The future format of the League Cup is still to be finalised and is subject to Football Association signoff but this forms part of plans for a revamp of an underloved competition that has an identity crisis. The changes include ditching the confusing group stage with its uneven number of teams, weird point scoring and odd geographical groupings. It is understood proposals have been put together in consultation with a competition working group that included clubs and was reviewed by representatives from fan associations through the Football Supporters‚Äô Association. Continue reading...

Chelsea's Maresca knocks back Man City rumours

items.title: Alonso denies need for Madrid's public support
items.summary: Xabi Alonso has insisted that Real Madrid are united "from the president to the players," denying that a public show of support from the club would help shore up his position as coach.

items.title: Slot: Liverpool have moved on from Salah saga
items.summary: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot said the club have "moved on" from the saga surrounding Mohamed Salah following his incendiary interview at Elland Road earlier this month.

items.title: Will this Wolves team go down as the worst in Premier League history?
items.summary: After 16 games they are yet to win and are on course to break Derby‚Äôs record of securing 11 points in a season By WhoScored At what point does a relegation scrap turn into a scramble to prevent an historic crisis? Wolves appear to be answering that question this season. Sixteen games into the season they are without a win, have just two points, and are threatening to relieve Derby County of the unenviable label of the Premier League‚Äôs worst ever team. This isn‚Äôt just another bad side going down; this is a club threatening to become the Premier League‚Äôs ultimate cautionary tale. Wolves may have already crossed that line. They became the first team in Premier League history to start consecutive campaigns with 10 or more winless matches, and now they stand on the brink of further infamy. Failure to beat Brentford this weekend would see Wolves equal Sheffield United‚Äôs record 17-game winless start in the 2020-21 season. Continue reading...

items.title: Bayern Munich‚Äôs Luis D√≠az: ‚ÄòI want to enjoy it and create those chaotic moments‚Äô
items.summary: The former Liverpool winger speaks about his hot start at Bayern, playing with Harry Kane, and hopes for the 2026 World Cup After leaving Liverpool this past summer, Luis D√≠az has had a strong start at Bayern Munich under Vincent Kompany, having accumulated 18 goal contributions (12 goals, six assists) in all competitions. Bayern manager Vincent Kompany gave D√≠az a few days off to press the reset button after his sending off against PSG, but now the 28-year-old winger is back and ready to wrap up the year as Bayern play their final game of 2025 this Sunday when they travel to Heidenheim. I spoke to the Colombian star about his new club, life in Germany and next summer‚Äôs World Cup, which includes a headline matchup against Cristiano Ronaldo‚Äôs Portugal. This interview has been lightly edited for length and clarity. Continue reading...
